20101220030631.000|20101220030632.667|CCO|PUBLIC EMPLOYEE PENSIONS
20101220030632.667|20101220030634.333|CCO|THAN IT DOES ON THE STATE
20101220030634.333|20101220030636.000|CCO|UNIVERSITY SYSTEM WHICH HAD
20101220030636.000|20101220030637.667|CCO|INCREASED TUITION BY 32%.
20101220030637.667|20101220030639.333|CCO|ARIZONA IS SO DESPERATE IT
20101220030639.333|20101220030641.000|CCO|SOLD OFF THE STATE CAPITOL,
20101220030641.000|20101220030642.667|CCO|SUPREME COURT BUILDING AND
20101220030642.667|20101220030644.333|CCO|LEGISLATIVE CHAMBERS TO A
20101220030644.333|20101220030646.000|CCO|GROUP OF INVESTORS.

20101220030657.000|20101220030659.000|CCO|IT HAD THE HIGHEST TAXES IN
20101220030659.000|20101220030701.000|CCO|THE COUNTRY, A $10 BILLION

20101220030741.000|20101220030742.250|CCO|>> Reporter: THIS IS GOING
20101220030742.250|20101220030743.500|CCO|ON ALL OVER THE COUNTRY.

20101220030751.000|20101220030752.111|CCO|DOESN'T HAVE THE MONEY TO
20101220030752.111|20101220030753.222|CCO|PAY FOR IT ANY MORE EITHER,
20101220030753.222|20101220030754.333|CCO|FOR THE STATES.

20101220032058.143|20101220032059.571|CCO|      SO YOU CAN BE READY
20101220032059.571|20101220032101.000|CCO|  ANYTIME THE MOMENT'S RIGHT.
20101220032101.000|20101220032102.250|CCO|                
20101220032102.250|20101220032103.500|CCO|        TELL YOUR DOCTOR
20101220032103.500|20101220032104.750|CCO|  ABOUT YOUR MEDICAL CONDITION
20101220032104.750|20101220032106.000|CCO|      AND ALL MEDICATIONS,
20101220032106.000|20101220032107.250|CCO|AND ASK IF YOU'RE HEALTHY ENOUGH
20101220032107.250|20101220032108.500|CCO|      FOR SEXUAL ACTIVITY.
20101220032108.500|20101220032109.750|CCO|  DON'T TAKE CIALIS IF YOU TAKE
20101220032109.750|20101220032111.000|CCO|    NITRATES FOR CHEST PAIN,
20101220032111.000|20101220032112.000|CCO|AS THIS MAY CAUSE AN UNSAFE DROP
20101220032112.000|20101220032113.000|CCO|       IN BLOOD PRESSURE.
20101220032113.000|20101220032114.000|CCO|  [ Man ] DO NOT DRINK ALCOHOL
20101220032114.000|20101220032115.000|CCO|     IN EXCESS WITH CIALIS.
20101220032115.000|20101220032116.000|CCO|    SIDE EFFECTS MAY INCLUDE
20101220032116.000|20101220032117.000|CCO|    HEADACHE, UPSET STOMACH,
20101220032117.000|20101220032118.000|CCO|        DELAYED BACKACHE,
20101220032118.000|20101220032119.000|CCO|         OR MUSCLE ACHE.
20101220032119.000|20101220032120.000|CCO|   TO AVOID LONG-TERM INJURY,
20101220032120.000|20101220032121.000|CCO|   SEEK IMMEDIATE MEDICAL HELP
20101220032121.000|20101220032122.000|CCO|  FOR AN ERECTION LASTING MORE
20101220032122.000|20101220032123.000|CCO|          THAN 4 HOURS.
20101220032123.000|20101220032124.000|CCO| IF YOU HAVE ANY SUDDEN DECREASE
20101220032124.000|20101220032125.000|CCO|  OR LOSS IN HEARING OR VISION,
20101220032125.000|20101220032126.000|CCO|       STOP TAKING CIALIS
20101220032126.000|20101220032127.000|CCO|AND CALL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY.

20101220034021.000|20101220034022.111|CCO|MIGHT EXPLAIN WHAT MAKES HER
20101220034022.111|20101220034023.222|CCO|MEMORY SO EXTRAORDINARY.
